article.title: Lockheed Martin Receives $12 Million U.S. Navy Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Mission Systems and Sensors, Owego, New York, is being awarded a $12 million order against a previously issued basic ordering agreement for services required to address obsolescence of the SP-103C single board computer shop replaceable assembly utilized within the tech-insert mission computer and tech-insert flight management computer.Â The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
